definition[0]: if the police or law courts impound something you have or own, they keep it until it has been decided that you can have it back
example[0]: He sued the police after they impounded his car.
definition[1]: if the police or law courts impound your possessions, they take them and keep them because a law has been broken
example[1]: Courts are authorized to impound any vehicle driven by a person without a valid license.
example[2]: The courts granted the request to impound all documents relevant to the case.
